Summaries.eng: Virtual reality. Murder. Werewolves. And teen girls! In a future where nothing is as it seems, can old legends come true? In the near future, humans will communicate almost exclusively through monitors, making real interaction a rarefied and weak occurrence for those living in a near totalitarian society. In this new world of communication, children are only allowed to interact personally on school grounds. So when a serial killer starts slaughtering junior high children the communication routes go under further surveillance. And despite all the safeguards put in place to avoid physical interaction, the killer's latest victim turns out to have been in contact with three young girls: Tsuzki Mio, a certified prodigy; Matsuno Hatsuki, a quiet but opinionated classmate; and Kouno Ayumi, her best friend. And as the girls get caught up in trying to quell curiosity under such terrorist scrutiny, Hatsuki learns that there is much more than meets the eye of their monitored communications.
Summaries.jpn: 近未来の世界では、恐怖のウイルスが横行しており、伝统的な食料や実体商店は、svcと呼ばれるシステムが开発され、仮想ネットワークとモニタリングを通じて人类を统一管理、监视している。绝対に安全な合成食品を食べて、限られた物理的交流をして、バーチャルネットワークは彼らの生活に不可欠な部分になります。人と交流障害のある少女・牧野叶月(冲佳苗)は、同グループの都筑美绪(井上麻里奈の声)の导きに骗されていた监视システムを骗し、家を出て、仲间の神々を访れて行方不明になった少女矢部の行方を捜している。暗影の下で、連続殺人事件の背後の秘密が次々に明るみに出て……
